channel.title: Comments on: Portishead names third record, stares blankly, then yawns

item.title: By: Astonishing Sod-Ape
item.dc:creator: Astonishing Sod-Ape
item.description: Are you insane? "Complete ass"?! Out Of Season is one of the best albums of the decade! How much time have you spent listening to it? I'm shocked!
item.content:encoded: Are you insane? “Complete ass”?! Out Of Season is one of the best albums of the decade! How much time have you spent listening to it? I’m shocked!
